short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay in Google Meet calls even if you're the only participant.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay in Google Meet calls even if you're the only participant.

When the "Are you still there?" dialog in Google Meet pops up, this extension waits for 10 seconds before clicking the "Stay in the call" button. Nothing else.

Icon source: https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Wereldkampioenschappen_paalzitten_in_Roelofarendsveen,_Bestanddeelnr_924-7954.jpg (CC0)
